entry.title: Tuesday night: A few showers or drizzle. Temperature steady near plus 4.
entry.summary: Showers or drizzle with risk of a thunderstorm. Fog patches. Temperature steady near plus 4. Forecast issued 03:57 AM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers or drizzle. Temperature steady near plus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers or drizzle in the morning. Rain beginning near noon. Fog patches dissipating near noon. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 late in the morning. Temperature steady near plus 5. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 03:57 AM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Rain ending late in the evening then cloudy with 40 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Rainfall amount 5 mm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming southwest 20 near midnight. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 03:57 AM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023
